newsitem.title: UK: London freight - BFI down 11 on weaker panamaxes.
newsitem.headline: London freight - BFI down 11 on weaker panamaxes.

text.p: The Baltic Freight Index (BFI) fell 11 points to 1,443, led down by weaker panamax fixing in the Atlantic, brokers said.
Continental grain relet Tai Zhou Hai was fixed for 54,000 tonnes heavy grain USGulf/Japan mid March at $24.25 basis no combination ports, down $0.50 from last reported business.
Bulfracht have fixed Bunga Srigading 65,900 dwt delivery USGulf mid March trip Japan at $12,500 daily plus $275,000 ballast bonus, down $2,000 daily on fixtures of similar tonnage a week ago.
At 1330 GMT BIFFEX futures were five to 20 points easier. The most actively traded months March posted the biggest losses on a volume of 49 lots. Total volume ammounted to 68 lots.
